/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. Trees line the street, their green foliage adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Streetlights stand sentinel along the road, their presence hinting at the transformation of the scene as day gives way to night. The image is a blend of man-made structures and natural elements, creating a harmonious balance that is characteristic of Beijing's cityscape.
